definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Even if indifference, but he was always a limitless a faith gives teared up.
sentences.chinese: 纵使淡漠无边，却总有一种信仰让泪流满面。

sentences.english: Bettie held her husband, with tears streaming down her face.
sentences.chinese: 贝蒂拥抱着她的丈夫，泪流满面。

sentences.english: The poor girl was in tears.
sentences.chinese: 这个清苦女孩泪流满面。

sentences.english: I cried in my apartment that night.
sentences.chinese: 晚上，我躲在单身公寓里，泪流满面。

sentences.english: A love that I burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 一句心疼说得我泪流满面。

sentences.english: "Very soon, death is coming, " he cried, with tears streaming down his face. Over and over.
sentences.chinese: “死神很快就要降临了，”它哭了起来，泪流满面。

sentences.english: Gazing at the snowwhite wall, he can't help his tears.
sentences.chinese: 他盯着那片雪白的墙，泪流满面。

sentences.english: Feng nods with tears come down his face.
sentences.chinese: 风泪流满面的点头答应了下来。

sentences.english: Rusalka lies by the lake, Vodnik genuflected aside, with tears on his face.
sentences.chinese: 鲁莎卡躺在湖边，沃德尼克跪在一边，泪流满面。

sentences.english: Tears stream down my cheeks when I recall the look of the deceased while in life.
sentences.chinese: 当我回忆死者在世时的音容笑貌时，不禁泪流满面。

sentences.english: U. S. winner Ms. Moore got teary on the brink of elimination ─ Ms.
sentences.chinese: 美国冠军摩尔曾一度濒临绝境而泪流满面。

sentences.english: He sat down under the leafless trees, and wept.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在光秃秃的树下，泪流满面。

sentences.english: Yet the turtle neither have a drink nor have a motion, only her face is bathed in tears.
sentences.chinese: 然而海龟不吃不喝也不动，它只是泪流满面。

sentences.english: Negus and his patriarchs were in tears.
sentences.chinese: 尼加斯和大主教们听得泪流满面。

sentences.english: Dennis screamed to his tearful wife as she sat in the back of the courthouse.
sentences.chinese: 丹尼斯冲妻子尖叫着，她正坐在法庭后面，泪流满面。

sentences.english: Perhaps the wind. Let acid, suddenly burst into tears.
sentences.chinese: 缐也许是山中酸风入眼，让人突然地泪流满面。

definition: eyes brimming with tears of excitement (idiom)/extremely moved
to bury one's head in one's hands and weep (idiom)
all sorts of feelings well up in one's heart
tears and mucus flowing profusely/sniveling/in a tragic state
to feel a pain like a knife being twisted in one's heart (idiom)
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
